definition: to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism

sentences.english: Lindholm says the study could be interpreted in a couple ways.
sentences.chinese: 林霍尔姆说这个研究可以通过许多方式去阐释。

sentences.english: The ontological character of literary understanding signifies self-understanding of interpretive subject.
sentences.chinese: 理解的本体论性质意味着阐释主体的自我理解。

sentences.english: What a perfect representation of performative sex.
sentences.chinese: 这是性行为的完美阐释。

sentences.english: The dissertation illustrates the characteristics of the postmodernist poetics from the following aspects:The Pelevin phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 论文从如下几个方面阐释作品的后现代主义诗学特征。

sentences.english: I will have an in depth article on this topic soon.
sentences.chinese: 就这个话题，我稍后会撰文作深入阐释。

sentences.english: In the introduction, the author briefly introduces the Phenomenology of Cassier's linguistic form.
sentences.chinese: 本文导论部分，简要阐释卡西尔的现象学理论。

sentences.english: The dispute illuminates the primitive nature of our attitude to portraiture.
sentences.chinese: 这一争论阐释了我们对肖像画的态度的本性。

sentences.english: This book provides an interpretation of the 3GPP standards for IMS.
sentences.chinese: 本书对3GPP中关于IMS的标准进行了阐释。

sentences.english: And the last part contains some advices about how China can deal with Section 337 investigation.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分对337条款调查程序进行了全面的阐释。

sentences.english: He acknowledged that unraveling and understanding the ramifications of the findings will not be simple.
sentences.chinese: 他承认要阐释和理解这些发现的影响并不容易。

sentences.english: The interpretation of the public character of education can only be based on its pedagogic property.
sentences.chinese: 对教育公共性特征的阐释，只能依据其教育学属性。

sentences.english: Second Confucian scholarship on the connotation and extension of thinking to explain.
sentences.chinese: 其次对孔子治学思想的内涵及外延进行阐释。

sentences.english: Perhaps the sea's definition of a shell is the peal.
sentences.chinese: 大海对贝壳的阐释，或许是珍珠。

sentences.english: The third talks about polysemy and its relation to homonymy , etc.
sentences.chinese: 第三节阐释了多义现象以及多义和同音的关系等。

sentences.english: Chapter Two explores the dialogism in the Light in August.
sentences.chinese: 第二章致力于阐释《八月之光》的对话性。

sentences.english: Soon Gandhi was expounding the doctrine of ahimsa (nonviolence).
sentences.chinese: 不久甘地就四出阐释非暴力主义思想。

definition: to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
epistemology (in philosophy, the theory of how we know things)
